document.full_text: conocophillips  said it will expand its planned sales of older, higher-cost assets by as much as $10 billion over the next two years, with proceeds earmarked to buy back stock.
document.title: conoco expanding asset sales; shares rise
lines_and_colors: conocophillips  said it will expand its planned sales of older, higher-cost assets by as much as $10 billion over the next two years, with proceeds earmarked to buy back stock.
